data.content:
noun
plural ~ puzzles
[count] :a puzzle made of many small pieces that are cut into various shapes and can be fit together to form a picture
We spent many nights working on a jigsaw puzzle of Mount Everest. - often used figuratively
Ecologists no longer view different species as independent, but instead see them as pieces of the same jigsaw puzzle. - called also (chiefly Brit) jigsaw
